message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for something worth so much. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $95 for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $98. It's still a great deal for you, and a fair price for me. Let's make this work!
Hi Alice, I've considered your offer and I'm willing to pay $96 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable!
